content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu,

I am not obligated to provide you with any information until we have an agreement. However, I am willing to negotiate the rental price. Let's start with your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I am willing to pay 300 Euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a low offer. I think you should increase it. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. You can't expect to get it for that price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, I will increase my offer to 400 Euros per month. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, but I still think it's too low. I'm sure you can do better. Remember, this is a great apartment in the city center. You won't find a better deal anywhere else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but I am a student and I have a limited budget. I will increase my offer to 450 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 450 Euros per month is still too low for this apartment. It's a great place, and it's worth more than that. I'm sure you can afford to pay more. Remember, this is a one-of-a-kind apartment in the city center. You won't find anything like it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but as a student, I have to consider my budget. I will increase my offer to 500 Euros per month. This is the highest price I can offer for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 500 Euros per month is a reasonable offer, but I'm sure you can do better. This is a great apartment, and it's worth more than that. I'm sure you can afford to pay more. Remember, this is a one-of-a-kind apartment in the city center. You won't find anything like it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand, but 500 Euros per month is the highest price I can offer for the apartment. I hope you can accept this offer.

[Your response]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: [Your response] I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
